}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Features=== *Can boost signal throughput up to 108 Mbps using SuperG Mode *Built-in 152-bit WEP data encryption for added security
==See also== :;[[EnGenius]] • *[[EnGenius EL-2511MP+]] *[[EnGenius EL-2611CB3+ Deluxe]] • Indoor Wireless Access Point Bridge (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius EL-2611CB5+]] • Outdoor Wireless Access Point Bridge (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius EL-2611CB5+ Ext]] • Outdoor Wireless Access Point Bridge (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius EL-3054CB3+ Deluxe]] • Indoor Wireless Access Point Bridge WDS (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius EL-3054MP+ Frisbee]] • *[[EnGenius EL-3054MP Aries2(f)]] • *[[EnGenius EL-3054MP+ Aries2]] • Wireless Mini-PCI Card (802.11b/g 54Mbps Long-Range) *[[EnGenius EL-5354MP+ Aries2]] • Wireless Mini-PCI Card (802.11a/b/g 54Mbps Long-Range) *[[EnGenius EL-5354MP Aries2(f)]] •
*[[EnGenius NL-2511CD+ Ext2]] • Wireless PCMCIA Adapter (Long-Range 200mW Output Power) *[[EnGenius NL-2611CB3+ Deluxe]] • Indoor Wireless Access Point Bridge (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius NL-2611CB5+]] • Outdoor Wireless Access Point Bridge (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius NL-2611CB5+ Ext]] • Outdoor Wireless Access Point Bridge (Long-Range 200mW) *[[EnGenius NL-3054CB+]] (Plus) • Mini-PCI adapter *[[EnGenius NL-3054CB3+ Deluxe]] • Indoor Wireless Access Point Bridge WDS (LongRange 200mW) *[[EnGenius NL-3054MP+]] (Plus) • Mini-PCI adapter *[[EnGenius NL-5354MP+ Aries2]] (Plus) • Mini-PCI adapter
